charts.name: Request Rate
charts.description: Latest request rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Request Rate
charts.description: Average request rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Top Requests
charts.description: Requests that were made most frequently in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Errors
charts.description: Latest error rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Error (%)
charts.description: Average error rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Top Failed Requests
charts.description: Requests that failed most frequently in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Latency
charts.description: Latest latency in the selected time window.

charts.name: Latency
charts.description: Average, median and P95 latency in the selected time window.

charts.name: Slowest Requests (P95)
charts.description: Slowest requests in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Request Latency
charts.description: Request latency histogram. Click a histogram column to view traces related to that percentile.

sources.name: api-request-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(jersey.server.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), operationName)))))

sources.name: api-fail-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', default(0, msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(jersey.server.response.*.errors.count, ${all_filters}))), operationName))))))

sources.name: api-latency
sources.query: round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(jersey.server.response.*.total_time.count, ${all_filters}))), operationName)))) / round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(jersey.server.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), operationName))))

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="jersey-server")

charts.name: QueuedThreadPool.dw.job
charts.description: “Number of jobs queued waiting for a thread”. This metric you want as low as possible as you don’t want requests waiting to be served. You may get the occasional 1, but that is when the metric grabbed it’s value, during the miniscule amount of time a single job is in the queue, and it is nothing to worry about, as all requests have to be served from the queue. To put in perspective, taking the average over 24 hours of this metrics in a production service yielded 0.0015

charts.name: QueuedThreadPool.dw.size
charts.description: The number of threads currently in the pool”. These are the threads in the (Jetty) web server that are servicing requests.

charts.name: QueuedThreadPool.dw.utilization
charts.description: The number of threads currently being used in the pool (eg. how many threads currently in the pool are not idle).

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="dropwizard")

sources.name: api-fail-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', default(0, msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(AspNetCore.response.*.5*.cumulative.count or AspNetCore.response.*.4*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), AspNetCore.resource.action))))))

sources.name: api-latency
sources.query: round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(AspNetCore.response.*.total_time.count, ${all_filters}))), AspNetCore.resource.action)))) / round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(AspNetCore.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), AspNetCore.resource.action))))

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="AspNetCore")

sources.name: api-fail-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', default(0, msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(ts(django.response.*.5*.cumulative.count or django.response.*.4*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}))), django.resource.func))))))

sources.name: api-latency

sources.name: api-request-rate
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(taggify(ts(grpc.client.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}), metric, grpcmethod, "^grpc\.client\.response\.(.*)\.([^\.]+)\.cumulative\.count$", "$1"))), grpcmethod)))))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: highpass(0, round(at('end', default(0, msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(taggify(ts(grpc.client.response.*.errors.count, ${all_filters}), metric, grpcmethod, "^grpc\.client\.response\.(.*)\.errors\.count$", "$1"))), grpcmethod))))))

sources.name: api-latency
sources.query: round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(taggify(ts(grpc.client.response.*.total_time.count, ${all_filters}), metric, grpcmethod, "^grpc\.client\.response\.(.*)\.([^\.]+)\.total_time\.count$", "$1"))), grpcmethod)))) / round(at('end', msum(1vw, rawsum(align(1m, sum, ratediff(taggify(ts(grpc.client.response.*.cumulative.count, ${all_filters}), metric, grpcmethod, "^grpc\.client\.response\.(.*)\.([^\.]+)\.cumulative\.count$", "$1"))), grpcmethod))))

sectionFilter.query: ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and component="grpc-client")

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and source="${source}" and span.kind?="${spanKind}"

cluster.queryValue: sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), cluster)
cluster.label: cluster

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and span.kind?="${spanKind}"

spanKind.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), "span.kind"), taggify(1, "span.kind", "*"))
spanKind.label: spanKind

valuesToReadableStrings.Label: sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and  source=${source}), sources)

source.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and not "_synthetic"="true"),sources), aliasSource(1, "*"))
source.label: source

shard.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), shard), taggify(1, "shard", "*"))
shard.label: shard

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and source="${source}"
